name: ConfUsed (Alto256)
description:
Confused is a high-core pixel art puzzle game. There are 2 boxes that main characters. Mission is the boxes find a way to get the keys to the doors and try to dodge the obstacles. Every movement input does 1 different move for each box at a time. So far game has 5 stages but new stages will coming soon. 

This game developed in Jamination 5 game-jam event.
